summary: A collection of command‑line tools and helper scripts that configure, launch, and manage Long‑Range Arena benchmark experiments, offering single‑run execution, hyperparameter grid search, batch job creation, and distributed execution via Submitit/SLURM, while handling resource allocation, checkpointing, and result aggregation.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to efficiently evaluate and compare attention mechanisms on long‑sequence tasks by automating experiment setup, execution, and result collection across single or multiple compute nodes.
